Text: These are all free on Apple's site for old OSes. and there's many missing in this collection. http://support.apple.com/kb/TA48312?viewlocale=en_US

Most of these, and system 9.2 (which is not available from Apple) also a great deal of old software are available at : http://macintoshgarden.org/

direct download, not torrent and ALL LEGAL !

The reason I made these images is because these combine all the floppy images and boot disk into a single image. Also in the case of the System 7.5.3 bootdisk, you dont have to download 19 induvidial .smi images, then open them in an old Mac.

Also these images are 100% legal since they only include operating systems Apple has freely released, and include no ROMs.
